name: Forsaken Wanderer
description:
Forsaken Wanderer is a science fiction game where you play as a lonely AI controlling a spaceship fighting a lone war against an alien race that exterminated humanity.

The game was created in a week-long game jam on the theme of "Extinction". This is an early build and still needs a lot of polish. We would love to hear your feedback so we could make it as good as possible in the future.
